# ShinyCICD

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R build status](https://github.com/miraisolutions/ShinyCICD/workflows/CI-CD/badge.svg)](https://github.com/miraisolutions/ShinyCICD/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ShinyCICD is to provide an example of a packaged Shiny app, to illustrate CI/CD pipelines on open source tools like GitHub Actions.

## Installation

You can install the released version of ShinyCICD from GitHub with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("miraisolutions/ShinyCICD")
```
